bio:
Yushari is a Khajiit who can often be found aggressively selling flowers at the Temple of Mara and Haelga’s Bunkhouse. She rarely takes a break. She sells a variety of flowers from all over Tamriel. A natural saleswoman, will try to bend every conversation to a reason why the person with whom she is conversing should buy her flowers.
Quotes:
"I am in business for myself. I am not here to make love. I am the love of my life. Go find me a mirror and I will kiss it."
"May your road lead you... to my store!"
name: Yushari
